name: UCO Bank Zonal Office JAIPUR
address:

second floor, Orbit Mall, Madrampur, Civil Lines, Jaipur, Rajasthan 302006

reviews.text:
recently visited the UCO Bank branch near Orbit Mall, Civil Lines, Jaipur, with my aunt to address a transaction issue. Unfortunately, our experience was extremely disappointing due to the unprofessional behavior of the staff.
The male staff were very rude and dismissive. When I asked for a solution to our issue, they replied harshly, stating, "We can’t do anything, and you’re not even our customer." Such a response is unacceptable in a service-oriented environment.

The branch manager, instead of addressing our concern, was busy on a phone call, during which he used abusive language in front of us. This behavior, especially in front of women, is highly inappropriate and unprofessional.

his experience left us feeling frustrated and disrespected. I would strongly advise others to think twice before opening an account at this branch. While UCO Bank is a government bank, the lack of accountability and basic courtesy from the staff is unacceptable.

I hope the bank takes steps to improve its customer service and ensure that such incidents do not happen in the future.
iiird Class  Staff & Very Poor Sarvece
Very bed service, customer care number not working
Very bad  service staff also not working properly
Very poor and knowledge less staff
You can reach here by metro (civil lines).
